ğŸš export PKG_CONFIG_PATH=/opt/lib/pkgconfig:/usr/lib/pkgconfig
ğŸš export CFLAGS=-I/opt/include 
ğŸš export LDFLAGS=-L/opt/lib 
ğŸš mktemp -d
ğŸš cd
ğŸš curl -fsSLO https://fukuchi.org/works/qrencode/qrencode-4.1.1.tar.gz
ğŸš echo da448ed4f52aba6bcb0cd48cac0dd51b8692bccc4cd127431402fca6f8171e8e  qrencode-4.1.1.tar.gz
ğŸš tee SHA256SUM
ğŸš cat SHA256SUM
ğŸš shasum -c SHA256SUM
ğŸš rm SHA256SUM
ğŸš tar -xf qrencode-4.1.1.tar.gz
ğŸš cd qrencode-4.1.1
ğŸš ./configure --prefix=/opt/package/qrencode-4.1.1
ğŸš make -j8
ğŸš sudo make install
ğŸš rm -rf
